articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Soccer-Bundesliga signs with Amazon Web Services for real-time statistics
articles.description: Germany's Bundesliga said on Monday that it had signed a deal with Amazon Web Services (AWS), making the Amazon.com company its official technology provider to deliver advanced real-time statistics to spectators from this season.'
articles.content:
Jan 13 (Reuters) - Germany’s Bundesliga said on Monday that it had signed a deal with Amazon Web Services (AWS), making the Amazon.com company its official technology provider to deliver advanced real-time statistics to spectators from this season. 
The deal… [+968 chars]
